definition: forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle

sentences.english: In order to survive in wars and riots, villagers often attached themselves to the large clans and thus became the obscure and dependent population.
sentences.chinese: 村民爲躲避戰亂和徭役，常投身大族，成爲隱附人口。

sentences.english: In fact, it was a kind of obligation of businessman.
sentences.chinese: 商辦採木實質上是一種加於商人的封建徭役。

sentences.english: In some dynasties, liquor tax with corvee and other tax related forms.
sentences.chinese: 在有的朝代，酒稅還與徭役及其他稅賦形式有關。

sentences.english: He wanted a place without conscripting far away from the Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 希望能遠離長城，找到一個沒有徭役的地方。

definition: forced labor/corvée (labor required of a serf)/animal labor
taxation/in former times, esp. land tax
to let sb off (punishment, taxation etc)/to reprieve sb
land tax/money and grain (given as tax or tribute)
